name: Ebontale
description:
Ebontale is a non-suspicious rpg, about your journey to the legendary Piamont City. There, you will find the most powerful relics in all the land, that will allow you to perform magic beyond your wildest comprehension! 

You may also experience a sense of freedom, as your boring modern life fades away into the background. 

A game by JUSTCAMH 
with music by Clockmaker

Get the game's soundtrack!

Made for Ludum Dare 47
